price: Mengapa orang-orang alim mereka, pendeta-pendeta mereka tidak melarang mereka mengucapkan perkataan bohong dan memakan yang haram?  Sesungguhnya amat buruk apa yang telah mereka kerjakan itu.
arabic: لَوۡلَا يَنۡهَىٰهُمُ ٱلرَّبَّٰنِيُّونَ وَٱلۡأَحۡبَارُ عَن قَوۡلِهِمُ ٱلۡإِثۡمَ وَأَكۡلِهِمُ ٱلسُّحۡتَۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا كَانُواْ يَصۡنَعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lawlā yanhāhumu al-rabāniyūna wal-aḥbāru ʿan qawlihimu al-ith'ma wa-aklihimu al-suḥ'ta labi'sa mā kānū yaṣnaʿūna
